name: Trainz Plus DLC - Industrial Switching
detailed_description:
Somewhere in Canada, in the city of Longview, offers a challenging industrial park that will challenge the train crews critical thinking skills to navigate and properly spot the freight cars.

Industrial Switching is an industrial themed route servicing 15 industries. The track is owned and maintained by Canadian Nation which services the industries 2-3 times a week. The primary power used during the switching is a single locomotive. The area is setup in a way, and without carefully planning your moves, can result having your engine at the other end of your train, so be prepared to exercise your critical thinking skills.



Special Features:
This DLC includes custom achievements that can be obtained. To view the achievements, go to System Menu > Achievements.


Developed by Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons

short_description: Somewhere in Canada, in the city of Longview, offers a challenging industrial park that will challenge the train crews critical thinking skills to navigate and properly spot the freight cars. Industrial Switching is an industrial themed route servicing 15 industries.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
